htmlBody: Personally, I want to make a recommendation for anyone working on technical AI safety without a computer from after 2018 to apply for a grant for a new one. (Grad students with access to university compute are slightly less critical, but if it's affecting your work at all, you should still do this.)
Hey, is this still a thing? I was just thinking there should be microgrants for AI x-risk researchers
The round has finished. It was a one time thing. Now that Nonlinear and Lightcone have run grant rounds, I don’t see a need to organise another round.
